basic_positioning_system.range: The Milky Way galaxy is approximately 100,000 light-years in diameter and about 1,000 light-years thick

basic_positioning_system.coordinate_origin: The center of the Milky Way galaxy (set as 0,0,0)

basic_positioning_system.quadrant_division: The galaxy is divided into four quadrants, with the galactic center as the origin

core_region.location: Solar System (0,8500,20) as center, spherical region with radius of about 5,000 light-years
core_region.characteristics: Controlled by 地球联合国, high stellar density, technologically advanced, administrative center

human_federation_region.location: 天津四 system (-32000,-18000,150) as center, elliptical region with radius of about 6,000 light-years
human_federation_region.characteristics: Controlled by 人类联邦, numerous military fortresses, developed heavy industry

neutral_zone.location: Mainly in the elongated zone from coordinates (15000,0,0) to (25000,0,0)
neutral_zone.characteristics: Jointly administered, thriving trade, concentrated diplomatic activity

edge_region.location: Galaxy periphery, 25,000 to 45,000 light-years from the galactic center
edge_region.characteristics: Resource-rich but underdeveloped, unstable security, frequent pirate activity

fallen_region.location: Sorens sector (10000,5000,100) between 地球联合国 and the neutral zone
fallen_region.characteristics: Originally a prosperous region of 地球联合国, now occupied by alien forces

solar_system.location: Orion Arm of the Milky Way, coordinates (0,8500,20)
solar_system.characteristics: 地球联合国 capital location, birthplace of human civilization, highly prosperous and urbanized
solar_system.important_celestial_bodies: Earth (human native mother planet), Moon (main industrial base), Mars (colony)
solar_system.strategic_significance: 地球联合国 political, cultural and scientific research center, housing the most advanced research facilities

天津四_system.location: Sagittarius Arm of the Milky Way, coordinates (-32000,-18000,150)
天津四_system.characteristics: 人类联邦 capital location, developed from early colony, highly militarized
天津四_system.important_celestial_bodies: 天津四 star (Earth-like planet, capital), Resus (satellite, military base)
天津四_system.strategic_significance: 人类联邦 military command center, largest fleet base, headquarters of military academy

sorens_system.location: Perseus Arm of the Milky Way, coordinates (10000,5000,100)
sorens_system.characteristics: Once a wealthy region of 地球联合国, now occupied by alien forces, frequent warfare
sorens_system.important_celestial_bodies: Sorens main star (resource-rich), Disax (industrial satellite, important mining area)
sorens_system.strategic_significance: Resource-rich front of contention, important strategic resource reserve

alpha_wormhole_node.location: Center of the neutral zone, coordinates (20000,0,0)
alpha_wormhole_node.characteristics: The largest artificial wormhole hub, connecting multiple important star systems
alpha_wormhole_node.important_facilities: Wormhole stabilizer, trading station, diplomatic zone
alpha_wormhole_node.strategic_significance: The most important transportation hub in the galaxy, controller can monitor large amounts of interstellar activity

wormhole_network.main_network: High-speed wormhole passages connecting the Solar System, 天津四 system and major core star systems

wormhole_network.branch_network: Smaller wormholes connecting secondary star systems

wormhole_network.wild_wormholes: Naturally formed unstable wormholes, random locations, high danger

radiation_belts.delta_radiation_zone: Located near coordinates (5000,15000,200), high-energy particle region

radiation_belts.gamma_ray_storm_belt: Outer perimeter of the galactic center, coordinates (0,2000,0) to (0,6000,0)

resource_distribution.energy_crystals: Mainly distributed in edge stellar regions, especially near coordinates (40000,-30000,500)

resource_distribution.rare_metals: Deposited in ancient planetary systems formed during early star formation

resource_distribution.conventional_resources: Widely distributed but varying in quality and purity

strategic_locations.defense_space_stations: Distributed at the borders of various powers, equipped with powerful defense systems

strategic_locations.covert_bases: Secret military or research facilities in special asteroid belts in edge regions

strategic_locations.monitoring_points: Distributed near important routes, monitoring vessel movements

black_hole_surroundings.dangers: Powerful gravitational fields, spacetime distortion, navigation system failure

unstable_wormholes.location: Appear randomly, but concentrated near coordinates (25000,40000,200)
unstable_wormholes.dangers: Random teleportation, possibly leading to unknown regions or void
unstable_wormholes.utilization_value: Potential discovery of new routes, but extremely high risk

interstellar_storm_zones.location: Mainly in the gaps between galactic arms and around alien invasion areas
interstellar_storm_zones.dangers: Electromagnetic interference, gravitational anomalies, communication interruption

地球联合国_headquarters.features: Fusion of classical and futuristic architecture, high security

人类联邦_assembly_hall.location: 天津四 star, New Rome City
人类联邦_assembly_hall.function: Military decision-making center, political gathering place
人类联邦_assembly_hall.features: Roman style mixed with Chinese elements, militarized design

galactic_academy_of_sciences.location: Solar System, Mars orbital space station
galactic_academy_of_sciences.function: Highest scientific research institution, cutting-edge technology development
galactic_academy_of_sciences.features: Modular laboratory clusters, open academic exchange areas

deep_space_monitoring_network.location: Network of detection stations distributed throughout the galaxy
deep_space_monitoring_network.function: Monitoring unknown threats, exploring new star systems
deep_space_monitoring_network.features: Automated operation, real-time data transmission to central

leisure_vacation_worlds.eden_planet: 人工天堂 controlled by 地球联合国, located at coordinates (2000,7000,50)

leisure_vacation_worlds.glory_garden: Military merit reward resort of 人类联邦, located within the 天津四 system

cultural_heritage_protection_zones.ancient_earth_culture_protection_zone: Museum of early human space development history on the far side of the Moon

cultural_heritage_protection_zones.pioneer_memorial_site: Monument to the earliest colonizers to reach 天津四, showcasing early survival struggles

forbidden_zones_secret_places.zero_point_laboratory: Secret research facility of 地球联合国, rumored to research 禁忌科技

forbidden_zones_secret_places.dark_archives: Confidential historical record repository of 人类联邦, location highly classified
